text: Faridollah Adib Ahein (born Faridullah Adeeb Ayan; November 7, 1965) is an Afghanistan visual artist, critic, and painter. He is known for his painting work, canvas work, and abstract expressionism. ==Early life== Ahein was born in Herat. His father, Azizuollah, was a rank-and-file officer. His mother was a teacher. During the Afghanistan Civil War, Ahein and his family immigrated to Iran, where he studied painting. ==References== ==Other websites == Category:1965 births Category:Painters Category:Living people Category:Herat Province
title: Faridollah Adib Ahein
